tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR,
  client_email VARCHAR UNIQUE,
  therapist_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (therapist_id) REFERENCES therapists(therapist_id)
);
CREATE TABLE therapists (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), specialty VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE clients (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), age INT, therapist_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (therapist_id) REFERENCES therapists(id));

CREATE TABLE messages (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_id INT, receiver_id INT, message_text TEXT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES therapists(id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_id) REFERENCES clients(id));

CREATE TABLE therapist (
  therapist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name STRING,
  last_name STRING,
  email STRING UNIQUE,
  password STRING
);

CREATE TABLE client (
  client_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name STRING,
  last_name STRING,
  email STRING UNIQUE,
  password STRING
);

CREATE TABLE message (
  message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_id UUID,
  client_id UUID,
  message_text TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE session (
  session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_id UUID,
  client_id UUID,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE therapist (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), specialization VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE client (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), age INT, therapist_id INT REFERENCES therapist(id));
CREATE TABLE message (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_id INT, receiver_id INT, message_text TEXT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, is_read BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE attachment (id INT PRIMARY KEY, message_id INT REFERENCES message(id), file_name VARCHAR(255), file_path VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE session (id INT PRIMARY KEY, therapist_id INT, client_id INT, start_time TIMESTAMP, end_time TIMESTAMP, duration INTERVAL);
